summary: AQIDEX - AQIDEX is a fully AI screener that provides advanced charting and signals for buying and selling cryptocurrencies. It is in beta and will be officially launched in February 2024. The platform aims to help investors align their investments with their values and ride the wave of growth in the cryptocurrency industry. AQIDEX is built on the Ethereum blockchain and follows the ERC-20 token standard. Its total supply is 500,000,000 AQID. The roadmap includes plans for a fair launch, partnerships with KOLs, and global expansion. AQIDEX is soon to be available on Google Play and the App Store. The platform has partnerships with UNCX and Coinsult. For more information, contact hello@aqidex.com.
